main: {status:BulletLament} has 2 types corresponding to the Potency and Count. Each stack consumed randomly chooses between the two types and applies the corresponding {status:SinkingWhite} on the target. Potency heals SP of attackers on hit. Count deals additional {keyword:Gloom} damage whenever {status:Sinking} is triggered. At turn end, Count expires and Potency is converted into Count (stacks with any Count applied on the next turn).
other: Skills are automatically cancelled once out of {status:BulletLament}, then he automatically consumes SP to {status:ReloadLament}. He also uses it at the end of his S3 or at 4+ A-Reson with his S2. Gains more Count at 0+ SP and more Potency at negative SP. Consumes less SP per {status:BulletLament} he had remaining before using {status:ReloadLament}.
Deals more damage per remaining {status:BulletLament} when using his S3.
Passive causes him to automatically use {status:ReloadLament} on kill.

1011001.desc: When this unit gains [BulletLament], gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
1011001.name: Fire.IShallFire.

1011002.desc:
Begin encounters with 10 of each of [BulletLament]

When consuming [BulletLament], select randomly between The Living(Potency) and The Departed(Count) for each [BulletLament] value.

When inflicting [SinkingWhite], inflict the same amount of The Living and The Departed as they were consumed. Example below:
- If this unit consumed X Living, inflict X Living
- If this unit consumed Y Departed, inflict Y Departed

If this unit runs out of [BulletLament] midway through Skill use, cancel all subsequent Coins and [ReloadLament]

When [ReloadLament]ing, or when gaining [BulletLament], gain either The Living or The Departed based on this unit's current SP
- At 0 or higher SP: 30% chance to gain The Living; 70% chance to gain The Departed.
- At less than 0 SP: 70% chance to gain The Living; 30% chance to gain The Departed.
- The probabilities are calculated separately for each ammo consumed.
1011002.name: ISeeTheDyingButterfly.

1011011.desc:
After Attack: if this unit killed the target with its Skill, [ReloadLament]
When this unit gains [BulletLament], gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
1011011.name: Fire.IShallFire.

1011021.desc: When an ally hits with a Skill, consume 2 [Sinking] on the target to inflict them with 1 [SinkingWhite] (3 times per turn)
1011021.name: Hand of Salvation

data.desc:
If the sum of the target's [Sinking] and both [SinkingWhite] is 6 or higher, Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Inflict +2 [Sinking] Count
data.name: Celebration for the Departed

Coin Power +1 for every 6 value of the sum of the target's [Sinking] and both [SinkingWhite] (max 2)
[WinDuel] Inflict +1 [Sinking] Count

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal +2% damage for every value of [BulletLament] consumed by this Skill

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Gloom damage equal to "All" [SinkingWhite] on target
- "All" = the sum of both The Living and The Departed on target
